page.title: 07Wheat farming
page.content: Our block is mainly{arable {farmland,}the main crop being{wheat. In spring the farmer ploughs the fields. When he has finished he goes over the field with a machine called a {harrow.}It breaks up all the hard lumps so that it is softer to plant the wheat. After about three weeks you can see little plants. The farmer uses a tractor with a {hoe.}It ploughs the field up gently without hurting the wheat. On the end of the tractor are little prongs which scrape the soil. When the wheat is green a tractor comes along with a{pesticide spray that kills insects. Later, when the wheat is ripe the farmer uses his biggest machine, a {Combine Harvester.
